navigation.About: Full-Stack Developer | Former IT Project Manager

hero.introductionSmallScreen: Hi, I'm a {{bold}} and I craft things for the web.
hero.introduction: Hi there! I'm a {{bold}} with a zest for all things digital. Leveraging my IT project management background, I bring a blend of leadership and technical savvy to the vibrant world of software development.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.descriptionPortfolio: Dynamic React, TypeScript and Next.js portfolio showcasing my full-stack development skills and projects.
projects.description2ndRound: SecondRound, a mobile app streamlining pre-owned video game trade, developed in 10 days.
projects.descriptionKoalapp: Visit stackkoala.online to explore Koalapp: Dynamic, personalized news articles. Articles are fetched from the News API and modified with AI to be more personalized.
projects.descriptionArc: Explore unique stays with Arc, your go-to for easy hotel bookings in France, crafted in a 24-hour coding sprint.
projects.descriptionRental: Rental: Online car rentals from sedans to SUVs, developed in 24 hours.

rental.title: Rental Challenge: 24-Hour Code Sprint to Revolutionize Car Rentals
rental.description: Rental was crafted in a 24-hour coding challenge, aiming to streamline the car rental process with an innovative online interface.

arc.title: Arc Challenge: Building a Hotel Booking Site in 24 Hours
arc.description: Arc was born from a 24-hour coding challenge to craft an intuitive hotel booking platform, simplifying user interactions and reservations.

koalapp.title: Koalapp Challenge: Reinventing News Delivery in a Day
koalapp.description: Conceived in a 24-hour hackathon, Koalapp revolutionizes how we consume news by integrating AI to dynamically update articles.

secondround.title: SecondRound Challenge: Transforming the Gaming Resale Market in 10 Days
secondround.description: SecondRound transforms the second-hand gaming market through a 10-day coding challenge, enhancing buyer and seller interactions.

portfolio.title: Portfolio Challenge: Mastering New Technologies through Practical Application
portfolio.description: This portfolio is the culmination of a personal challenge to learn and master React, Next.js, and TypeScript by building a dynamic and interactive online portfolio that showcases projects and skills.

about.title: About Me
about.mePart1: My name is {{bold}}. With a deep-seated curiosity and a fervent passion for the digital world, I've fully embarked on a journey as a full-stack developer. My previous experience in IT project management, within an international landscape, honed my leadership and communication skillsâ€”assets I'm now eager to apply in the dynamic realm of software development.
about.mePart2: My transition to full-stack development stemmed from a desire for fresh challenges and a commitment to innovation. Through my training, I've gained proficiency in technologies like Ruby on Rails, JavaScript, React, HTML, and CSS. Drawing on my experience as an IT project manager, where I led complex system migration programs, I'm well-equipped to oversee significant software development projects. I'm particularly eager to deepen my expertise in the JavaScript ecosystem, focusing on React, TypeScript, Node.js, and beyond. Full-stack development isn't just a career path for me; it's a passion that I'm excited to explore and expand upon.
about.not_at_desk: When I'm not at my desk...
about.balance_work_play: Don't be fooled by all the coding talkâ€”I firmly believe in the importance of balancing work and play. That's why you might find me at the gym staying fit, hanging out with friends, or enjoying a good Netflix session. I'm always up for an adventure.
